TEXT.TITLE: OLIN <OLN> UNIT ACQUIRES IMAGE TECHNOLOGY
TEXT.BODY: Olin Corp's Olin Hunt Specialty Products Inc said it acquired Image Technology Corp for undisclosed terms. Image Technology makes chemicals for the semiconductor industry. Reuter
